become_guide.hero_title_1: Your freedom as an adventure guide
become_guide.hero_description: Aventurei is the active tourism platform specialized in nature where certified guides from Valencia build their independent business — 100% free, without depending on massive platforms that keep your margin.
become_guide.urgency_bar: 0% commission, totally free. Only 20 spots available in Valencia in this beta phase — when they fill up, we close the form.
become_guide.problem_title: Being an independent guide shouldn't be a constant struggle
become_guide.problem_subtitle: You know the mountain better than anyone, but the current digital ecosystem is designed to squeeze you, not empower you.
become_guide.pain_1_desc: Large platforms take up to 30% of your effort, drastically reducing your real margin.
become_guide.pain_2_desc: Your profile competes with hundreds of guides. The algorithm decides who appears first. You control nothing.
become_guide.pain_3_desc: If they change the algorithm, your business sinks. You have no control over your customers or their data.
become_guide.pain_4_desc: You compete on price against massive operators that devalue the quality of the real nature experience.
become_guide.solution_title: Reclaim the value of your work and connect with real travelers
become_guide.sol_1_desc: We don't mix things up. Here there are only authentic ecotourism and active sport experiences. The customer who enters is looking for what you offer.
become_guide.sol_2_desc: We charge nothing to publish your adventures or receive contacts. Zero commission, zero monthly fee. Your money is yours.
become_guide.sol_3_title: Total control over your calendar and prices
become_guide.sol_3_desc: You decide when you work, how much you charge, and how you organize your routes. No impositions. No unilateral changes.
become_guide.sol_4_desc: Our audience seeks quality over quantity. People who value the experience, respect nature, and repeat.
become_guide.comparison_subtitle: We are not a tour supermarket. We are a select community of professionals.
become_guide.comp_massive_2: Mix of everything (Museums, Tour bus, Nature)
become_guide.final_title: Ready to lead your own adventure?
become_guide.final_description: We don't ask you to marry us. We only ask for 15 minutes to explain how we can help you live better from your passion.
become_guide.form_footer: Your data is safe. We will only use it to contact you.
